metadata.inclusion:
1. Ensure the door lock is open
2. Open the battery cover and press the [REG] button
3. Press [*] then [8][8]
metadata.exclusion:
1. Ensure the door lock is open
2. Open the battery cover and press the [REG] button
3. Press [*] then [9][9]
metadata.reset:
1. Ensure the door lock is open
2. Open the battery cover and press the [REG] button
3. Press [*] then [5]
4. Press [*] then [2]
